description: edX is a massive open online course platform. The Smashing Magazine audit (2021) highlighted issues with course discovery, registration friction, and performance on search results pages. Benchmark tasks cover the primary learner journey.
tasks: Search for a beginner-level Python programming course and enroll in it.
Create a new account on edX using an email address and complete the registration form.
Find and compare three data science courses from different universities, noting price and duration.
